guildQuests.name: First Blood
guildQuests.description: Defeat 10 enemies in any combat zone.

dialogue.accept: Your first quest! Show us what you've got, {playerName}!
dialogue.complete: Excellent work! You're a natural adventurer!

guildQuests.name: Forest Cleaner
guildQuests.description: Clear the Whispering Woods of corrupted creatures.

dialogue.accept: The Whispering Woods are overrun. Can you help us, {playerName}?
dialogue.complete: The forest is saved! You've earned this badge of honor.

dialogue.accept: Prove your combat skills by defeating more foes.
dialogue.complete: 50 enemies vanquished! You're becoming a true warrior, {playerName}!

guildQuests.name: Crypt Explorer
guildQuests.description: Venture into the Ancient Crypts and defeat the Lich King.

dialogue.accept: The crypts hold ancient dangers. Only the brave should enter.
dialogue.complete: You've defeated the Lich King! Truly remarkable, {playerName}!

dialogue.accept: Your next milestone awaits. 100 enemies must fall.
dialogue.complete: A hundred foes defeated! Your legend grows, {playerName}!

dialogue.accept: An adventurer needs resources. Gather your wealth!

guildQuests.name: City Investigator
guildQuests.description: Explore the Forgotten City and defeat the Mech Overlord.

dialogue.accept: The Forgotten City holds secrets of the old world. Uncover them!
dialogue.complete: The machines are silenced! You're unraveling the ancient mysteries!

dialogue.accept: Only the elite can claim this quest. Are you ready?
dialogue.complete: 250 enemies! You've proven yourself an elite hunter, {playerName}!

guildQuests.name: Dragon Challenger
guildQuests.description: Face the Dragon Lord in Mount Inferno.

dialogue.accept: The Dragon Lord awaits. This is a quest for only the bravest.
dialogue.complete: You've faced a dragon and lived! Legendary, {playerName}!

dialogue.accept: 500 enemies. Only masters achieve this feat.
dialogue.complete: 500 enemies fallen! You're truly a master of combat!

guildQuests.name: Wave Survivor
guildQuests.description: Survive to wave 20 in Endless Mode.

dialogue.accept: Endless Mode tests your true endurance. Survive 20 waves!
dialogue.complete: 20 waves survived! Your endurance is incredible, {playerName}!

guildQuests.name: Shadow Confrontation
guildQuests.description: Defeat the Shadow King and save the world.

dialogue.accept: This is it, {playerName}. The final battle. Defeat the Shadow King!
dialogue.complete: YOU DID IT! The Shadow King is defeated! You are the LEGEND!

dialogue.accept: 1000 enemies. A feat only legends can achieve.
dialogue.complete: ONE THOUSAND! You are truly a legendary slayer, {playerName}!

guildQuests.name: Endless Champion
guildQuests.description: Survive to wave 50 in Endless Mode.

dialogue.accept: Only S-rank adventurers can attempt this. Survive 50 waves!
dialogue.complete: 50 WAVES! You are the Endless Champion, {playerName}!

dialogue.accept: Complete every quest to prove you are the True Legend.
dialogue.complete: All quests complete! You are THE TRUE LEGEND, {playerName}! The greatest hero this world has ever known!

rankDialogues.E: Congratulations, {playerName}! You've been promoted to E-Rank! More challenging quests await.
rankDialogues.D: D-Rank achieved! You're becoming a recognized adventurer, {playerName}!
rankDialogues.C: C-Rank! The guild acknowledges your exceptional skills, {playerName}!
rankDialogues.B: B-Rank! Only the elite reach this level. Well done, {playerName}!
rankDialogues.A: A-Rank! You're among the top adventurers in the realm, {playerName}!
rankDialogues.S: S-RANK! The highest honor! You are a legend among legends, {playerName}!
